gameDetails.name: Rebels & Redcoats: Volume II
gameDetails.description:
Volume II in the Rebels & Recoats series.  The Game covers the Saratoga Campaign and the Southern Campaign of the American Revolution and includes eight different battles.  The battle scenarios are:

Saratoga Campaign

    Bennington
    Freeman's Farm
    Bemis Heights


Southern Campaign

    Camden
    Cowpens
    Guilford Court House
    Hobkirk's Hill
    Eutaw Springs


Game includes: 360 counters, 2 22" x 34" mapsheets, 16-page rules booklet, 2 player aid cards, and 1 d-10.  Game relies on a fairly simple sequence of play to recreate 18th Century linear warfare:


     Command Segment
     Bombardment Segment
     Reinforcement Segment
     Movement Segment
     Assault Segment
     Rally Segment


Also includes separate rules for light infantry and dragoons as well as scenario specific rules.
